creator: shmulikk@gmail.com
text:
Hello,
I am using the new feature for concurrent pool size, which is very important for accurate performance measurements.

It is working just fine on the HTTP Request Sampler, but for some reason it is disabled on the HTTP Request Defaults (maybe someone forgot to enable it?).

Thanks.

creator: milamber@apache.org
text: You must checked "Retrieve all embedded Ressources from HTML files" to enable "Use concurrent pool size" on HTTP Request Defaults (and HTTP Request)

creator: shmulikk@gmail.com
text: I guess that I'm the one who forgot to enable it :)
